Question
========

It is hypothesized that there is a positive-linear relationship between smoking intensity (X) and alcohol consumption (Y). In a random sample of n = 30 persons, one finds R~XY~ = 0.26. On the basis of this result the null hypothesis ρ~XY~ = 0 can be rejected at

Answerlist
----------

* Α = 0.01
* Α = 0.05, but not at α = 0.01
* Α = 0.10, but not at α = 0.05

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Α = 0.01: Incorrect
* Α = 0.05, but not at α = 0.01: Incorrect
* Α = 0.10, but not at α = 0.05: Correct
